name: The Bubble Trivia Game
description:
The Bubble Trivia Game  is a learning game. it's based on the fact that the more you play the game, the better you will remember the facts. The game is like a true false  trivia game.

It has three different trivia games inside 

How to play:

  • On the first screen choose your trivia subject and click the oyster
  • Pop the true bubble fact with the mouse
  • Avoid the false bubble fact 
  • Try to catch the swimming fish from time to time
  • You get more point if you pop the true bubbles in a row.

This game is also available  for P.C. in this version you can edit your own trivia games (up to three games) by editing the trivia Json files.

It is also  possible to translate the GUI by editing the Language file.
